AAanalysis
  • API
  • Edit on GitHub

API

This Application Programming Interface (API) is the public interface for the objects and functions of our AAanalysis Python toolkit, which can be imported by:

import aaanalysis as aa

You can then access all methods and objects via the aa alias, such as aa.load_dataset.

Data

aaanalysis.load_dataset([name, n, random, ...])

Loads protein benchmarking datasets.

aaanalysis.load_scales([name, just_aaindex, ...])

Loads amino acid scales or their classification (AAontology).

Feature Engineering

aaanalysis.AAclust([model, model_kwargs, ...])

AAclust: A k-optimized clustering framework for selecting redundancy-reduced set of numerical scales.

aaanalysis.SequenceFeature()

Retrieve and create sequence feature components (Part, Split, and Scale).

aaanalysis.CPP([df_scales, df_cat, ...])

Create and filter features that are most discriminant between two sets of sequences.

aaanalysis.CPPPlot([df_cat, accept_gaps, ...])

Create and filter features that are most discriminant between two sets of sequences.

PU Learning

aaanalysis.dPULearn([verbose, n_components, ...])

Deterministic Positive-Unlabeled (dPULearn) model.

Explainable AI

Perturbation

Plot Utilities

aaanalysis.plot_get_clist([n_colors])

Returns list of 2 to 9 colors.

aaanalysis.plot_get_cmap([name, n_colors, ...])

Returns color map specified for AAanalysis.

aaanalysis.plot_get_cdict([name])

Returns color dictionarie specified for AAanalysis.

aaanalysis.plot_settings([font_scale, font, ...])

Configures general settings for plot visualization.

aaanalysis.plot_set_legend([ax, ...])

Sets a customizable legend for a plot.

aaanalysis.plot_gcfs()

Gets current font size.
